```jsx
  <ae-list>
    <ae-list-item>Hello World</ae-list-item>
    <ae-list-item>Hello World</ae-list-item>
    <ae-list-item>Hello World</ae-list-item>
    <ae-list-item>Hello World</ae-list-item>
    <ae-list-item>Hello World</ae-list-item>
  </ae-list>
```

### prop: face: primary
```jsx
  <ae-list face="primary">
    <ae-list-item>One</ae-list-item>
    <ae-list-item>Two</ae-list-item>
    <ae-list-item>Three</ae-list-item>
  </ae-list>
```
